abstract: California regulators adopt a system for combating climate change that sets limits on greenhouse gas emissions and creates market incentives to encourage oil refineries, electricity generators and other polluters to clean up their plants.
snippet: The new system includes cap-and-trade market incentives to encourage polluters to clean up their plants, an approach much of the rest of the country has resisted.
lead_paragraph: The new system includes cap-and-trade market incentives to encourage polluters to clean up their plants, an approach much of the rest of the country has resisted.

headline.main: California Adopts Limits on Greenhouse Gases
headline.print_headline: California Adopts Limits on Greenhouse Gases
headline.seo: California Adopts Cap-and-Trade System to Limit Emissions
